§ Kehb

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Kehb** is one of the [[world-18-characters]].

**Kehb** is a deity.

**Kehb** is //biologically immortal// — meaning that unless something or someone kills him, he will continue to live on.

Like all of his kind, **Kehb** has green skin, 2 long pointy ears, 2 short antennae, and purple colored blood.

Legend has it that **Kehb** is able to create //land-quakes//, and created the first serpents and dragons.

§§ Family

**Kehb** is a descendent of [[putah]].

**Kehb** is the father of [[usirus]].
